web-view.web-page.generic-urls-alert-message: We support defining user custom URLs. To define it, wrap user constants inside double curly brackets, like so: <1 /> <2> https://www.example.com/{{profile.nick}}?id={{id}}</2><3 /><4 /> When defining user custom URLs, consider protecting the screen - requiring user to log in. If user is not logged in, user specific URL parts might not be parsed as inteded. To protect your screen, go <6 /> to Settings > Users > Protected screens.
